text: APARTMENTS 32821 Chatham Square is an upscale community that will offer residents all that they need for a life of luxury and ease. Our selection of 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom, 3 bedroom, and 4 bedroom floor plans are sure to suit every lifestyle and our community features amenities that are waiting to be explored. Aside from our beautiful homes, our ideal location in Orlando will allow residents to discover all that the surrounding area holds. See why you should live in Orlando here and find your new home at our apartments in 32821! Top 5 Reasons to Live in Orlando, FL #1 Year-Round Sunshine and Outdoor Adventures With an average of 233 sunny days per year, Orlando is a paradise for outdoor enthusiasts. Whether you enjoy hiking at Wekiwa Springs State Park, kayaking on the crystal-clear waters of Rock Springs Run, or strolling through scenic Lake Eola Park, there’s no shortage of ways to enjoy the great outdoors. #2 World-Class Entertainment and Attractions Living in Orlando means having world-famous attractions at your doorstep. From Walt Disney World to Universal Studios, the city offers an unmatched entertainment scene. Even if theme parks aren’t your thing, you can enjoy live performances at Dr. Phillips Center for the Performing Arts or catch an Orlando Magic game at the Kia Center. #3 Thriving Job Market and Career Opportunities Orlando is a hub for innovation, technology, and business growth. With a booming tourism industry, a strong healthcare sector, and a growing presence in tech and aerospace, job seekers have countless opportunities. Companies like Lockheed Martin, EA Sports, and AdventHealth make Orlando a city full of career potential. #4 A Diverse and Dynamic Food Scene Food lovers will find plenty to savor in Orlando. From award-winning fine dining establishments to hidden gems serving global cuisines, the city is a melting pot of flavors. Visit the East End Market for local artisan eats, explore authentic international dishes along Mills 50, or indulge in fresh seafood at one of Orlando’s top-rated restaurants. #5 A Vibrant Arts, Culture, and Nightlife Scene Orlando’s cultural landscape is as diverse as its residents. Explore world-class museums like the Orlando Museum of Art, experience the indie scene at the Orlando Fringe Festival, or enjoy the energy of Thornton Park’s nightlife. With rooftop lounges, craft breweries, and exciting events happening year-round, there’s always something new to discover. These are just a few of the reasons that you will love living in Orlando at our apartments in 32821. Come home to Chatham Square and contact us today for more information!
